item.description: From: X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court) Subject: : Bonne Année! Date sent: January 27, 2023, 16:53 (Beijing time) To: Cc: Many people including the FBI and the State Department, I will update this section later From: X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court) Subject: TYPE_SUBJECT_HERE Date sent: Month DD, YYYY, HH:MM +0800 (China Standard Time) To: Gloria SANTONA Cc: Steve EASTERBROOK 【Note: Steve EASTERBROOK was at the time the CEO of McDonald’s Corporation】

item.title: Crime report sent by email, to among other people, Nicole Belloubet, François Molins, Rémy Heitz, Hélène Davo, and Emmanuel Macron
item.description: Date sent: January 25, 2019, at 00:44 (China Standard Time) On January 25, 2019, at 00h44 (China Standard Time), I sent an email to, among other people, Nicole Belloubet, François Molins, Rémy Heitz, Hélène Davo, and Emmanuel Macron. In this email, I alerted them about the critical dysfunctions of the French judicial system. I also provided 7 concrete examples of the serious crime of faux en écriture publique, the falsification/doctoring/altering/forging of a court/public/official/legal document/decision, under articles 441-1 and 441-4 of the French criminal code.

item.title: Forgery and use of forged documents at the Legal Aid Office of the Versailles Court
item.description: Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2018-10-23_1934_0800-faux-et-usage-de-faux-baj-versailles_Redacted.pdf From: Vincent B. Le Corre Subject: Forgery and use of forged documents at the Legal Aid Office of the Versailles Court? Date sent: October 23, 2018, at 19:34 +0800 (China Standard Time) To: Bernard.KEIME@justice.fr, Veronique.Malbec@justice.fr, Christophe.Mackowiak@justice.fr, Vincent.Lesclous@justice.fr, Marc.Cimamonti@justice.fr On October 23, 2018, at 19:34, I alerted high-ranking French magistrates, encompassing both public prosecutors and judges, about a grave incident at the Legal Aid Office of the Versailles Court.
